bibl.title: The King is Dead. Studies in the Near Eastern Resistance to Hellenism, 334-31 B.C.
bibl.seg: Eddy Samuel K., The King is Dead. Studies in the Near Eastern Resistance to Hellenism, 334-31 B.C.
Lincoln, Nebr., University of Nebraska Press, 1961, 8°, x-391 pp., 1 carte et 8 pll. 8,50 dollars.

C.R. par S. Lieberman, CW 56 (1962) p. 76. - C.H. Gordon, AHR 69 (1964) pp. 496-497. - J.H. Marks, JBL 82 (1963) pp. 462-463. - J. Leclant, RBPhil 43 (1965) pp. 1022-1025. - M. Hadas, AJP 85 (1964) pp. 204-206. - P. Pédech, REA 66 (1964) pp. 245-247. - C. Schuler, CP 61 (1966) pp. 203-204. - B.R. Rees, JEA 50 (1964) pp. 196-197. - A. Wartelle, BAssBudé 4e s., No. 2 (juin 1965) pp. 273-275. - J. Pouilloux, AntCl 34 (1965) pp. 330-332. - G.J.D. Aalders H. Wzn., Mnemosyne 4a s., 18 (1965) pp. 322-327.
